body_html:
I still think that this doesn't matter, and we have already things like that in the RandomSampler (for different reasons), so I think this is really a micro-optimization.

Or we just say that it's a bug in pandas and do nothing about it ourselves :-)
body_text:
I still think that this doesn't matter, and we have already things like that in the RandomSampler (for different reasons), so I think this is really a micro-optimization.
Or we just say that it's a bug in pandas and do nothing about it ourselves :-)
body:
I still think that this doesn't matter, and we have already things like that in the [`RandomSampler`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/utils/data/sampler.py#L51) (for different reasons), so I think this is really a micro-optimization.

Or we just say that it's a bug in pandas and do nothing about it ourselves :-)
